import './admin-update-customer.css' import history from '../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' export default function AdminUpdateCustomer() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/admin/customers') } const initialPassword = '' const handleSubmit = (values) => { let sentPassword = values.password if (sentPassword === '') { //don't send "values.password", send "sentPassword" sentPassword = initialPassword; } console.log(values)//TODO delete history.push('/admin/customers') } return ( <>
